Package net.ffxml.swtforms.factories

Consists of optional Forms framework factory classes that assist you in building consistent forms quickly.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ComponentFactory An interface that defines the factory methods as used by the net.ffxml.sharplayout.builder.PanelBuilder.
 

Class Summary
Borders Provides constants and factory methods for Borders that use instances of ConstantSize to define the margins.
ButtonBarFactory A factory class that consists only of static methods to build frequently used button bars.
DefaultComponentFactory A singleton implementaton of the ComponentFactory interface that creates UI components as required by the com.jgoodies.forms.builder.PanelBuilder.
FormFactory A factory that creates instances of FormLayout for frequently used form layouts.
 

Package net.ffxml.swtforms.factories Description

Consists of optional Forms framework factory classes that assist you in building consistent forms quickly.

Related Documentation

For more information see:
  • http://www.jgoodies.com/articles/forms.pdf

See Also:
net.ffxml.sharplayout.layout, net.ffxml.sharplayout.builder
